body:
Hey Everybody,

One of my favorite Avicus memories were all the maps. Is there any way to download them (Not trying to steal) and use them in a mini game. Do I have to ask the builder?

I know Avicus is done, but these maps are beautiful.

Please respond
body_tagged:
Hey Everybody,

One of my favorite Avicus memories were all the maps. Is there any way to download them (Not trying to steal) and use them in a mini game. Do I have to ask the builder?

I know Avicus is done, but these maps are beautiful.

Please respond
title: Question about maps. Please respond

replies.body: Unless you're mapdev and can download the whole repository you aren't getting any maps.
replies.body_tagged: Unless you're mapdev and can download the whole repository you aren't getting any maps.

replies.body:
You can private message the authors of maps.
There are also quite a lot of maps on the resourcepile website.

Most map creators still have the downloads of their maps, or if they gave you permission to use them, you can probably ask Avicus mapdevs for the downloads.
replies.body_tagged:
You can private message the authors of maps.
There are also quite a lot of maps on the resourcepile website.

Most map creators still have the downloads of their maps, or if they gave you permission to use them, you can probably ask Avicus mapdevs for the downloads.

replies.body:
ResourcePile has a public collection that we are currently working on and trying to get as many maps as possible.
https://mcresourcepile.github.io/maps/avicus

Make sure to check the license, depending on what you want to use them for.
replies.body_tagged:

Make sure to check the license, depending on what you want to use them for.

replies.body: Thanks guys, just please  save Quintus and Luar
replies.body_tagged: Thanks guys, just please  save Quintus and Luar
